archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Vice President and Provost Administrative Files
1984-1997

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Vice President and Provost Administrative Files, Accession #RG-3/1/2.991, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred by Krista English, Office of the Provost, Madison Hall 314, University of Virginia on 1999 July 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Office administrative files (correspondence, memoranda and reports) of the Vice-president and Provost including alphabetical topical, office administrative, and miscellaneous files.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Topical Files. Boxes 1-6
Series II: Biennial Planning Files. Boxes 7-10
Series III: School Files. Boxes 11-14
Series IV: Restricted Files. Box 15
